titles.title: To amend the Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century to repeal the Interstate System Reconstruction and Rehabilitation Pilot Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 8/6/1998--Introduced. Amends the Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century to repeal authority for the Interstate System Reconstruction and Rehabilitation Pilot Program.
